title: LaTeX Converter
summary: Uses LSTMs, SVMs, and transformers to convert handwritten math equations into LaTeX code.

title: Random Forest Trading Bot
summary: Predicts whether a Yahoo Finance stock will go up or down using a random forest model.
contentHtml:
Overview

Random forest classifier trained on Yahoo Finance data to predict stock movements.

title: Equation Clipper
summary: Executable like Snipping Tool that transcribes equations from screenshots into LaTeX.
contentHtml:
Overview

Clipboard tool that captures an image and outputs LaTeX markup of detected equations.

title: Finance Trading Bot
summary: Uses RSI & Mean Reversion to execute optimal trades.
contentHtml:
Overview

Automated trading strategy based on RSI and mean reversion signals.

title: LureLore (Hack the North Finalist)
summary: AI identifies fish and memorializes them in a 3D aquarium.
contentHtml:
Overview

Built at Hack the North 2024, this app identifies fish with computer vision and creates a 3D aquarium.

title: ProdWatch
summary: Uses AI & computer vision to detect whether you are focused or not.
contentHtml:
Overview

Productivity tracker that monitors focus using computer vision.

title: PHY180 Pendulum Analysis
contentHtml:
Overview

Analysis of pendulum oscillations and energy conservation.

title: CIV102 Bridge Analysis
contentHtml:
Overview

Structural analysis of bridge designs for course project.

title: Praxis III - Wildfire Detection System
summary: A sensor tower which predicts wildfires before they even begin.
contentHtml:
Overview

IoT sensor network with weather and smoke detection to anticipate wildfires.

title: Praxis II - SyncPod
summary: A canoe paddle sensor that measures strokes per minute for synchronization.
contentHtml:
Overview

Hardware paddle device tracking strokes/minute to improve canoe team sync.

title: Best Buy Web Scraper
summary: Scrapes Best Buy for laptop data and formats it neatly.
contentHtml:
Overview

Web scraper that parses Best Buy laptop listings into structured datasets.

title: DataTracker
summary: Record a running list of data. Supports different categories.
contentHtml:
Overview

Lightweight data logging application with categorical tagging.

title: TUTORial
summary: Online tutoring service that helps kids with homework and studying for tests.
contentHtml:
Overview

Web platform for homework support and test prep tutoring.

title: Arduino Projects
summary: Collection of projects built with Arduino and breadboards.
contentHtml:
Overview

Basic electronic circuits and projects to learn Arduino.

title: Blackjack (Text-Based)
summary: A text-based Java game that puts a new spin on Blackjack.
contentHtml:
Overview

Console game implementing Blackjack rules with custom variations.

title: Portable Arduino Timer
summary: A portable Arduino timer that allows you to count upwards or count downwards.
contentHtml:
Overview

Timer circuit with up/down counting functionality on Arduino.
